Name: Collaborate.com
Description (SOSV):
Collaborate.com is a unified document sharing, task management, and team communication environment for today’s mobile workforce. With native support for iPhone™, iPod Touch™, Android™, and the Web – and out-of-the-box integration with popular cloud services such as Box™, Dropbox™, Evernote™, Google Drive™, Apple iCloud™, and email – teams can get started with Collaborate.com in minutes by visiting the Collaborate.com Web site or downloading the app directly from the App Store or Google Play.

Collaborate.com is a service of Boston-based Kibits Corp. The company was founded in 2011 by seasoned entrepreneurs Matt Cutler and David Greenstein and is backed by Google Ventures, Charles River Ventures, General Catalyst, SOS Ventures, Commonwealth Capital Ventures, Launch Capital, and others.

Name: CommonTrip
Description (SOSV):
CommonTrip is a mobile first social network app for commuters that rewards you for every trip you make. WhatsApp meets uberPOOL

By making connection and communication between drivers & riders seamless, we make carpooling for daily commutes a more satisfying experience. It is a reliable alternative to public transport use & boring single occupancy trips. 

Less time spent searching through carpools listing sites to find matches as here it is with someone in their network and not with a complete stranger.

It is a social networking platform that target the millennials. Through sponsorship, we provide financial incentives for "green miles". Track 'Green Miles' (like Fly Miles for airline travel) and claim real-world rewards including vouchers and offers. 

You can redeem Green Miles for store gift cards, free coffee or dinner, accessories, song downloads, movie tickets, donations to charity, etc.

Name: DaekiTech
Description (SOSV):
Type 2 Diabetes is a world threat, even though the market is flourishing with numerous treatment and monitoring products and services, the detection of the disease is far from ideal.
Nowadays half of all diabetics remain undiagnosed, and we want to get them diagnosed early enough to prevent the consequences of diabetes.

We are developing an innovative non invasive screening device for type 2 diabetes that uses only saliva to detect the disease. Similar to a pregnancy test, it uses a lateral flow assay that indicates through visual results if there is a high risk of having or developing type 2 diabetes in minutes.

Right now we are raising £150.000 to complete our next development stage.
Pre-Embed:
DaekiTech is based in London, United Kingdom. Description: Type 2 Diabetes is a world threat, even though the market is flourishing with numerous treatment and monitoring products and services, the detection of the disease is far from ideal.

Name: Dogether

Our team is passionate about enabling people around the word do things together in a safe way! We are looking to expand within India & globally & are currently seeking an investment. If you’re interested, let’s talk!

Name: Fabule
Description (SOSV):
Fabule is an early-stage startup that is transforming how small businesses develop hardware. We pick up where Kickstarter leaves off, with BoM Squad, a cloud-based SaaS tool to facilitate the collaboration between project creators and manufacturers, from prototyping, to sourcing, to shipping.

BoM Squad is an enterprise SaaS trojan horse. The Bill of Materials manager is useful on its own, and has generated early interest from contract manufacturers. But since the BoM is so integral to the quoting process, Fabule's SaaS offering positions us to create a multisided marketplace where we can collect transaction fees for matchmaking manufacturers with clients, and aggregating component orders to take advantage of bulk discounts.

Name: Face8
Description (SOSV):
Face8 gives brands direct access to airport/rail passengers' mobile phones, via free entertainment we provided to passengers. Users can print photos and postcards via WeChat, download movies, apps and games via Baofeng Technology, get to know each other via photo sharing and networking, and enter into lucky draws sponsored by advertisers.

Each year 400 million Chinese air passengers sit idle at boarding gates for an average of over 2 hours. China has world's worst on-time rate. However, these passengers only pay attention to their mobile phones, rendering those advertising billboards less effective. Each year 1.5 billion USD is spent on those billboards. 

Face8 is on a mission to change how people wait for their flights, and how advertisers get to users effectively.

Name: FeetMe
Description (SOSV): FeetMe has a mission to simplify and accelerate therapeutic and rehabilitation evaluations through continuous real-life mobility assessment. Name: FinCo
Description (SOSV):
FinCo Management is a financial services contractor in the automotive industry, providing business process outsourcing to auto dealers who want to approve and finance their own deals. 

FinCo's BuyHere-PayTHERE product gives dealers and dealer groups the control to finance those subprime deals which make business sense but no lender will buy. 

FinCo has put together the best tools, vendors, and processes to create the smartest finance department in the industry. The decision to grant credit terms to a customer is entirely the dealer's, FinCo does the rest: Originations, Underwriting, Documentation, Servicing & Collections, Customer Service, Repossessions, and Remarketing.

At it's core, Sophia the Smart Rope is a fitness tracker, measuring jumps, speed, calories burned. Progress can be tracked with Sophia’s built in LED screen, smart phone app, and integration to IOSHealth or Google Fit.

With the companion app, Sophia the Smart Rope turns in to an active gaming device to add some fun and friendly competition to your workout regime.  Challenge friends from around the world in global challenge or sync two ropes to a single device to compete with a friend in arcade mode.

Name: Flicktek
Description (SOSV):
FlickTek creates the ﬁrst and only sensor technology for the wrist able to read and understand finger movements - a fast and natural way of interaction that lets you focus on what's ahead and think forward.

The FlickTek's proprietary technology is the most accurate sensor for wrist devices capable of monitoring the fingers movements and gestures. The biometric signals generated by the tension and movement dynamics of the tendons and body tissues on the wrist are transformed into electrical signals. The FlickTek's machine learning algorithm analyzes these signals and recognizes the gesture performed.

Name: Foobot
Description (SOSV): Foobot is the first connected indoor air quality monitor that keeps track of the air around you by measuring the temperature, humidity, carbon dioxide, toxic chemicals (VOCs), and harmful particulates (PM2.5). By using the smart phone app, you can see details for each pollutant in the air for a given space and monitor how your air quality evolves over time depending on your activities. Not just a monitor, Foobot recently evolved to leverage home automation to fix your air quality automatically, ensuring your air at home is always free of pollutants.

Name: FoodMarble
Description (SOSV): FoodMarble provide technology to help patients and consumers to measure their digestion. This is done using a tiny, app-connected breath test device. In 2021, they sold over $1.5m direct-to-consumer (2x year-on-year growth). In Feb 2022, they launched their 2nd generation consumer device, which has led to further strong growth and as of July, they have now launched their 2nd generation medical device into US healthcare. With FDA clearance and health insurer reimbursement in place, they are set for immediate growth. The data collected from over 30,000 devices and counting is enabling new AI-powered approaches to helping both consumers and patients to overcome common, chronic digestive conditions from the home, at scale.

Name: Fooze
Description (SOSV):
The fastest and easiest way to satisfy your late night cravings. Fooze is the 1-tap delivery app for your favorite late night munchies. Every night, we feature a different selection of three delicious munchies from great late night restaurants. Simply choose your munchie, and tap to order. Our meals are always a convenient all-inclusive price.

- Late night munchies delivered FAST
- Simple ordering process, just 1 tap
- No complicated menus, no difficult decisions
- A nightly changing selection of 3 late night munchies, so you never get bored
- Signature dishes from your favorite late night restaurants. 
- An all-inclusive price covering tip, tax, service, and $2.99 delivery fee
- Open late every night of the week

Currently available for late night delivery in select Manhattan zip codes.

Some example munchies: Philly cheesesteak, steak tacos, buffalo wings, chocolate cookie, ribeye bacon fried rice, cheddar bratwurst, chicken burrito, pork ramen, strawberry nutella crepe, and more!

Name: Forkyoo
Description (SOSV):
Forkyoo = Seamless for Premium Meal Kits

Customer Problem: 

Home cooks generally lack the time and skill to easily put together restaurant quality meals in the comfort of their own kitchens. 

Limited choices, untested dishes, delivery options and lengthy prep time are still major issues.

Customer Solution:

No Mess. No Prep. Simply Cook Like The Best.

Forkyoo partners with popular local restaurants to bring the novice home cook the best menu recipes & pre-prepped ingredients, directly from the chef’s kitchen. 

Restaurant Problem: 


Limited by Seating Capacity

Leftover Perishable Ingredients

Fully Cooked Dishes Have Higher Labor Costs

Marketing is Expensive, One-Dimensional & usually Not Performance-Based


Restaurant Solution:


Seating Capacity is Unlimited

Uncooked Dishes To-Go

Easy & Controlled Growth: Control Availability, Price, Inventory & Hours

Subsidized Through Saved Labor Costs

Marketing is Cheap, Intimate, & Performance Based

Name: Formlabs
Description (SOSV):
Scale prototyping and production with affordable, industrial-quality SLA and SLS 3D printers.


Formlabs is a desktop 3D printing company that also worked with US hospitals to 3D print nasopharyngeal (NP) swabs needed to collect samples for COVID-19 testing. A Formlabs printer could produce approximately 300 print swabs per build with the same material as Surgical Guide Resin. The company received the FDA’s Class I exemption and its swabs were used for patients at University of San Francisco and Northwell Health. 
- Read more on the [Formlabs COVID-19 website](https://formlabs.com/covid-19-response/covid-test-swabs/) and in [their feature on CNBC](https://www.cnbc.com/2020/04/22/coronavirus-3d-printing-companies-answer-the-call-for-swabs-for-covid-19-tests.html).

Name: Freshchefs
Description (SOSV):
Corporate event catering is limited because restaurants and chefs lack the service capacity and logistical network to deliver at scale. Focusing on e-sports first, it is among the first to market in Asia-Pacific that serves a 100M+ user“niche” that is growing at a baffling rate for years now. After the initial launch we will continue expanding the market by adding other popular sports such as NBA, FIFA Cups, Ol etc.

Name: Move2Play
Description (SOSV):
At Move2Play, our mission is to get kids moving! We combine interactive technology with lovable characters and creative gameplay to inspire cooperative, active play.

With adolescent screen time at an all time high, movement based play has never been more important... 

Active kids, as measured by a recent study, are 10 times less likely to become obese. They demonstrate up to 40% higher test scores, and are much less likely to start smoking or doing drugs at a young age. In fact, they are 15% more likely to go to college.

However, 3-in-4 parents said their kids often refuse to play games without some form of technology... 

By embedding movement-centric tech in lovable toys, Move2Play provides the active play solution for parents. Every minute of motion counts - so let’s MAKE MOVING FUN!!

Name: Gamer Guides
Description (SOSV):
The idea for Gamer Guides was originally conceived back in 2010 during a playthrough of Final Fantasy XIII. After using the hardback version of the official guide, beautiful and detailed as it was, it became apparent that trying to use a heavy book wasn’t the easiest experience when also trying to complete a section of a game at the same time. Surely there was a more interactive, modern way of creating guides while also keeping the attention to detail and beauty found in the paper versions? And so, Gamer Guides was born.

Eight years later, after realising just how difficult making guides was in the first place, let alone making them functional while maintaining quality, Gamer Guides has levelled up from novice to expert in what was, at times, a perilous adventure. While not quite legendary status yet, with your continued support, we are aiming to achieve the ultimate goal - to be the most interesting and accurate source for strategies, walkthroughs and all round game information available. With your help (and maybe with a few tanks and healers along the way too), we know we can get there.
Pre-Embed:

Name: Genome Surveillance
Description (SOSV): Genome Surveillance is developing a novel “scaffold sequencing” technology in order to solve the central problem of genomics, genome sequence assembly and analysis using Next-Generation Sequencing(NGS) data, by providing ultra long-range sequence information. Specifically, these problems are: first, to facilitate de novo genome sequencing and sequence finishing; second, to detect long range structure variations; third, to phase haplotype variants; fourth, to pursue high resolution metagenomics; fifth, to differentiate polyploid genomes; and finally to rapidly genotype for disease diagnosis and important trait variants. Our “scaffold sequencing” technology is creatively combining NGS with large single DNA molecule analysis to form a single platform, which will produce the needed solution to these important problems in genomics. Thus, the enabling of scaffold sequencing technology will have huge market potential and significant impact on biological and medical sciences.
Pre-Embed: Genome Surveillance is based in Madison, United States. Our “scaffold sequencing” technology is creatively combining NGS with large single DNA molecule analysis to form a single platform, which will produce the needed solution to these important problems in genomics. Name: Giroptic
Description (SOSV):
Giroptic has developed and patented a unique real-time image fusion process from multiple sensors. On May 20th 2014, Giroptic launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund its first consumer product: the GIROPTIC 360cam. In 45 days, the startup raised over $1.4 million, thus becoming France’s largest crowdfunding campaign.

Giroptic paves the way to a new 360° era, for consumers and professionals, where photos and videos won’t be limited to a single frame. They enable people to communicate, capture and share their experiences in the most immersive way, through innovative devices and services.

We recruit, train and manage 100s of international and diverse coaches, driving down retail cost by bringing “idle” coaching resources online. We make the “right” coach available to each member and enable live meetings anytime and anywhere via our mobile-friendly virtual session room and calendar.

Name: GogglePal
Description (SOSV):
AR Devices is a team of avid skiers and engineers. For years, snow sports hobbyists have been flying blind. Over the course of many ski seasons, we decided that it was time to add another layer of fun to our days on the mountain. After countless hours of research, piles of design sketches, and boxes of prototypes, we created GogglePal, your best pal on the mountain.

Created by skiers and riders, for skiers and riders, GogglePal enables you to add augmented reality (AR) and a real-time heads up display (HUD) to any pair of goggles. Simply attach the small GogglePal AR-HUD device to your lens, and you're ready to unlock a mountain of data, virtual treasures, and games. With GogglePal’s augmented reality technology, you can keep track of all sorts of data, like speed, vertical, calories burned, acceleration, time and direction, and see it all in real time. 

Whether you challenge yourself or your friends, GogglePal tells your mountain story with the information that matters most.

Name: H2O Pal
Description (SOSV):
Many people mistreat the symptoms of dehydration using coffee and medicine, when what they really need is water.

H2O-Pal monitors your water intake and helps you stay hydrated by giving you reminders when you need to drink water. It's a small device you simply attach at the base of a bottle, it is completely nonintrusive and our design makes it possible so it works with different water bottles.

Similar to a fitness tracker, H2O-Pal is a hydration tracker that works with your water bottle. It makes your life easier by helping you drink more water and fewer calories.

H2O-Pal uses Bluetooth Smart which provides great battery life for added convenience.

Name: HabitAware
Description (SOSV):
**HabitAware makes an awareness bracelet to prevent face touching.** Its Keen bracelet uses machine learning to recognize hand gestures in real time. This product was developed to treat Body-Focused Repetitive Behaviors (BFRB), has won multiple awards including TIME Magazine Best Innovation in 2018, and already sold thousands of units. HabitAware has seen a spike of usage as frontline healthcare workers and the general public are now using the Keen bracelet to stop face-touching behaviors and reduce the spread of COVID-19. 
- More on how HabitAware prevents face touching [here](https://habitaware.com/pages/stop-face-touching).

Name: Heads Up
Description (SOSV):
Heads Up is an industrial safety analytics platform. The Heads Up Safe communication system consists of industrial hygiene sensor technology, real-time job-site data, hazard awareness training, and compliance reporting. Heads Up Safe’s technology roadmap solves safe use of mobile devices onsite as well as hazardous exposure to noise, temperature, humidity, noxious gas, and dust/silica, and lone worker. Our platform architecture is suited for rapid deployment and adoption onto any industrial site. 

Heads Up Safe technology has been awarded by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration as one of the best new solutions for reducing workplace exposure.

Name: Health Linkages
Description (SOSV):
Health Linkages provides an easily-installable software system for collecting and analyzing health data, enabling organizations to save over 90% of analytics time and headcount while allowing better analytics and regulatory compliance. open APIs.

Name: Heartland Brothers
Description (SOSV):
71% of Chinese people consider food safety to be one of their biggest challenges of living in China. Heartland Brothers provides high quality meat from free range family farms in the US. Today, Chinese consumers can purchase Heartland Brothers free range artisanal pork at 20 supermarkets, 50 high end restaurants and wholesale through 3 national distributors.

据调查，71%的中国消费者将食品安全视为在中国生活的一大挑战。因此，Heartland Brothers致力于将美国家庭农场的天然优质猪肉带给中国消费者，目前已与20家超市、50家高端餐厅以及3家批发分销商建立合作关系。

Name: Helios
Description (SOSV):
Helios is reinventing the biking experience. Helios Bars are the world's first integrated headlight and blinker system for bicycles. 

With only 4 screws, you can turn any ordinary bike into a smart bike. Our iOS app unlocks a variety of features that have never been offered on a bike before. This includes ambient lighting, iPod/music control, turn-by-turn navigation, & a visual speedometer function that changes colors based on your speed. Additionally, a built-in GPS module allows you to track your bike's location from anywhere in the world.

Helios is based in San Francisco, United States. Description: Helios is reinventing the biking experience. Helios Bars are the world's first integrated headlight and blinker system for bicycles.

Name: Hexology
Description (SOSV):
Created for anyone that wants to share content in a real location, #hexology is the app that puts digital media into the real physical world. It empowers everyone with an ability to publish, share and discover the people and places around us, and so encourage our communities to connect and grow. 

As a first step in a plan to deliver a cutting-edge multimedia brand that uses fiction as a mechanism to engage participants in an interactive world of discovery, #hexology is a location-based social media platform created as a springboard to launch mixed media into the public imagination.

Name: Hi-in
Description (SOSV):
There are more than 1.3 million Chinese students studying outside china. Since 2015, around 80% of them (“haigui”) have returned back to China but 90% of them are unable to find the jobs they want. Hi-In uses AI technology to create personalized career action plans for these students including online and in-person courses, internships and mentors before graduation and post graduation introduces them to leading China financial and technology companies.

数据显示，超过130万中国留学生在海外学习，自2015年起约80%的中国留学生（“海归”）选择回国就业，其中90%无法找到心仪职业。海英网依托人工智能技术为学生制定个性化的职场行动计划，提供线上、线下职业准备课程、实习机会与导师指导，从而帮助他们在中国顶尖金融与科技公司找到心仪职业。

Name: Hippo & Crate
Description (SOSV):
Hippo&Crate is a subscription-based D2C oral care brand fast becoming a world-class lifestyle brand for personal care CPGs. Think of us as the DollarShaveClub of the U.S. whom got acquired by Unilever for a cool US$1B with MUJI aesthetics.
 
We are in the early innings of a generational oral care upgrade in China and riding on the mega consumption upgrade trend that is taking the entire continent by storm. Our purpose is to allow our customers to look and feel good, and that's why we went to great length to make really high quality, beautiful oral care products with better ingredients for them.
 
Our model is relatively simple, vertically integrated, digital native disrupting the major players like P&G, Unilever by cutting off the retailers and selling to the consumers direct. We do this by building up a fanatical fan base with word of mouth tactics. These behemoths do not have relationship with their customers and overly depend on broadcast advertising, this is where we come in.
 
Brushing is the new Sexy!

Name: Hoard
Description (SOSV): Hoard is developing the first network of smart storage locations to help people exchange physical things with others. From now on people that rent out their apartment (like on Airbnb) can manage the access for guests and cleaners from anywhere with smartphone-controlled key lockers placed in 24/7 retail stores close to their apartment. Simply book a spot to drop off your key, get a Hoard code, and share it with your guest who can pick up the key with the shared code.

Name: Hyasynth
Description (SOSV): Despite its increasing popularity in medicine, cannabis is too costly to produce at a large scale with the quality and consistency needed for medical use. Instead of depending on the cannabis plant and breeding new strains, we use engineered yeast to produce the same products, including THC, CBD, and even many of the minor cannabinoids, which are only found in small quantities in the plant. Compared to plants, our process is exponentially cheaper and faster while also giving patients, doctors, and researchers the quality they can depend on.

Name: iCE Angel - ID
Description (SOSV):
iCE Angel‐ID™ offers total peace of mind by ensuring that you and your loved ones are always connected. It is an easy to use mobile app and web service that immediately notifies your family and shares your location and critical medical / insurance information in case of emergency anywhere in the world.

It’s the world's first FREE medical alert and emergency identification system that allows you to trigger a panic alert at the touch of a button - or enables any passerby or emergency services worker (who we refer to as an Angel) to trigger an emergency alert on your behalf by simply scanning your personal QR code wallet card.

Name: Ideamarket
Description (SOSV):
Idea Market is a crowd-sourced marketplace that matches entrepreneurs with pre-funded concepts to create companies. It brings together ideas, talent, and money to build successful companies. The company’s aim is to help create 1 million companies in the next 20 years, creating 10 million jobs, and positively impacting a billion people and resulting in 1 trillion dollars in value added to the global economy.

Idea Market was founded in 2014 by Bill Gross and is headquartered in San Francisco, C.A.

Name: Indemand
Description (SOSV):
Indemand is on a mission to bring technology to the hundreds of thousands of independent, ethnic and speciality grocers throughout the US.

Our software empowers grocery stores to connect directly with their customers online and gain insight into their store data whilst improving their overall experience.

Brick and mortar grocers are getting left behind as the industry shifts online, many of which offer a unique and personalised touch to their loyal customers. We're bringing that experience online and enabling stores to easily start offering local delivery without any additional overhead for the business.

We're uniquely positioned with key strategic partners and relationships through a team that has years of experience working with small businesses, within the natural food industry and running grocery stores.

Name: Ambrosia
Description (SOSV):
I/O is a waste management company with a centralized solution for urban areas in the fast growing organic waste market. We've adapted a method of lactic acid fermentation to sterilize and preserve organic material in an indoor, industrial setting without methane emissions. Our proprietary approach puts us on the front lines of this developing ecosystem, fitting in with existing industry infrastructure.

We can quickly process organic waste into a quality controlled, shelf-stable, shippable feedstock with utility in a variety of industries. Our first products will be marketed to the agricultural sector as a fertilizer.

The business model is primarily focused on waste management, with secondary revenue from end product sales. We're initially targeting a collection service to the commercial sector, including restaurants, hotels, breweries, indoor farms, and food processing facilities.

Name: TinyChef
Description (SOSV): NutriChef is an AI-powered platform designed to assist dietitians in delivering personalized nutrition management. It streamlines client onboarding, analyzes dietary profiles, generates tailored meal plans, and interprets medical data, including blood reports. The platform also features a client-side application, TinyChef.ai, enabling clients to complete intake forms, upload medical records, and photograph meals for automatic analysis. Since its inception in 2017, NutriChef has raised $3 million and is currently focusing on user growth and revenue expansion, aiming to achieve $100,000 in monthly recurring revenue by March 2025.

Name: Juicies Inc
Description (SOSV):
We design innovative power solutions for mobile devices.

Modern smart phones and tablets are masterpieces of design and technology. However their battery life is often not. Billions of people have to recharge their mobile devices on a daily basis. We see this problem as our opportunity.

Without juice our devices turn into nothing more then pretty paperweights. Hence power solutions are the most important mobile accessory. Our products are compatible with billions of smartphones and tablets across the globe.

What charges you?
Pre-Embed:
Juicies Inc is based in Honolulu, United States. Description: We design innovative power solutions for mobile devices.

Modern smart phones and tablets are masterpieces of design and technology. However their battery life is often not. Billions of people have to recharge their mobile devices on a daily basis. We see this problem as our opportunity.

Without juice our devices turn into nothing more then pretty paperweights. Hence power solutions are the most important mobile accessory. Our products are compatible with billions of smartphones and tablets across the globe.

Name: Jungla
Description (SOSV): Headquartered in South San Francisco, Jungla is a biotechnology company delivering robust and scalable results for clinical genetic and genomic testing. To achieve this, Jungla develops and combines advances in functional genomics, computational biophysics, and computer science to proactively inform on the risk of variants in our genome. Jungla aims to empower clinical genetic testing with quantitative, model-driven guidance to complement and enhance observational data. Whereas existing solutions routinely used in the market have demonstrably poor accuracies, Jungla delivers robust, scalable, and auditable support with dramatically higher accuracies and increasingly mechanistic cellular and biophysical insights. We are supported by leading technology and healthcare investors.

Name: KiLife Tech, Inc.
Description (SOSV):
Kilife Tech is creating technology to improve the way we see the world. Creating digital insights into the physical world.

KiLife Tech was founded as a problem driven company seeking to develop technology to solve the problem of keeping track of young children in high risk environments. Over 2 years we developed 3 versions of consumer products and released 2 of them to solve the problem. We 've had our share of challenges with manufacturing, quality, and design issues. Over the last 6 months we have realized far greater potential in our technology driven by customer demand and solution focused development. We are seeing greater success with our new B2B technologies and  pursuing these to facilitate our original desire to helps parents keep kids safe with our as yet unreleased final version of the child tracker.

Name: Kindara
Description (SOSV):
Kindara is creating a new healthcare system for women, delivered through the mobile phone. Kindara makes money by selling devices and subscriptions and by generating leads to practitioners, products and services. In Oct 2014 we released Wink - the first of 5 devices that will pair with our platform to give women a beautiful integrated experience in managing their reproductive health.  

Women's health is a $53 Bn global market underserved by technology. We want to change that. Kindara is used by hundreds of thousands of women to understand fertility challenges, get pregnant or avoid pregnancy naturally.  We are a top 20 app in the Medical category in the App Store, and have helped more than 750k women understand their fertility and feel powerful around their bodies and health. .

Name: Kira's Kiss
Description (SOSV):
Home to ALL-NATURAL, HEALTH-CONSCIOUS DESSERTS. At Kira's Kiss, they bring you a healthy alternative to sugary and cholesterol-laden foods - but never skimp on SUBLIME GOURMET TASTES.



Here at Kira's Kiss, they make fantastic desserts without any preservatives, chemicals or trans-fats. They use only the finest all-natural domestic and imported ingredients. All of their products are MANUFACTURED IN THE USA with the freshest possible ingredients.



Their premiere line of health conscious cupcakes are specially formulated no sugar added, lower calorie, low sugar treats. Their proprietary baking techniques and recipes allow us to create lush, voluminous, rich cakes that are filled with a full, creamy symphonic flavor. You will never experience a trace of the flatness, gumminess or chemical aftertaste common with typical "diet" options.

Name: KoalaSafe
Description (SOSV):
KoalaSafe is making technology work for parents, not against them.

With an average of 8 devices in the home, 19,000 new apps & 6,000 new domains per month it’s a new world for this generation of parents. Parents struggle with where their kids are online, what they are seeing and with maintaining a healthy balance of screen time.

KoalaSafe takes this big problem and solves it with a little box. Controlled from your smartphone, it provides a healthier internet in the home. Simply plug it into your existing home router and connect all your children's devices. The internet is no longer a free-for-all resource that is constantly on. Schedules, time-limits, filtering and a rich suite of usage analytics that allow families to work together to strike a balance that is right for them.

Happier families, healthier internet

Name: Kolibree
Description (SOSV):
Kolibree, the smart oral care company has created the world's first smart sonic toothbrush that turns tooth brushing into a game, educates kids, and empowers parents. 

Our connected toothbrush uses 3D motions sensors and Bluetooth connectivity to interact with our mobile app, which has games and coaching activities to motivate kids and adults alike to brush their teeth more efficiently and for the dental recommended two minutes twice a day.

At Kolibree we believe that smart connected objects truly have their place in our daily lives. More than just gadgets, they serve a vital role in raising awareness of the impact that our daily activities have on our health and guiding us to improve our behavior. Our mission is to create the interactions between users and connected objects which make the objects even more efficient.

Name: Koniku Inc.
Description (SOSV):
"Koniku Inc. is an early stage startup based in San Rafael, Northern California. We are the world’s first wetware company. Our premise is as simple as its radical: “the merger of synthetic neurobiology, neuroscience, and silicon technology into a coherent, sturdy and elegant device which solves urgent real-world problems anywhere — in the lab, industry, and on a street corner”. 

Our maxim is: “Bio is Tech™”. In fact, we believe: “any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from nature.” Our current device detects volatile organic compounds in concentrations of PPB - PPT using GPCR's without line of sight or contact.”

Name: Kountermove
Description (SOSV):
Kountermove is the world's best place to play Fantasy MMA. It's like daily fantasy football or baseball, but for UFC / MMA events.  #1 Google result – “fantasy MMA”.

We are at the intersection of two massive consumer trends – mixed martial arts and fantasy sports. Like fantasy football, fantasy MMA will become a core part of the entertainment experience.

UFC is holding 50 events+ in 2015, with leagues such as WWE, Bellator MMA, GLORY Kickboxing, Metamoris Pro, and World Series of Fighting promoting dozens more.

Our current business model is the traditional fantasy sports approach, we earn commissions of ~12% on every cash entry.

Description (SOSV): Leap Motion is transforming how we interact with technology using the original interface: the human hand. Over the last two years, we’ve shipped almost half a million motion-tracking controllers to developers and consumers around the world, opening up new possibilities for a platform beyond the screen – from music and gaming, to healthcare and education, to the next generation of VR/AR interfaces. Name: Learnlode
Description (SOSV):
LearnLode is an integrated suite of software services for contact centres and enterprises. It comprises the following key modules: knowledge base, analytics, decision support tool and training and assessment module. Learnlode’s proprietary technology and algorithms allow contact centres to take an integrated lifecycle approach to the information that agents need. LearnLode’s predictive knowledge base knows the knowledge that agents need and ensures that they only see the information that is relevant to them. Our analytics track all of the activity on the system and gives real-time reporting.  
LearnLode meets a substantial market gap as half of all contact centres lack knowledge management software, and three quarters lack decision support tools. LearnLode offers a lightweight, affordable, easy to deploy solution. LearnLode is in revenue, building a significant sales pipeline in Ireland and the UK and preparing to scale and enter the global online market

Name: Liloe labs
Description (SOSV):
LiLoE Labs is a startup in the IoT and home automation space that looks at solving the last-mile delivery dilemma and improving the customer e-commerce experience.

LiLoE Labs is developing the Jeffrie which behaves similarly to a doorman of a residential property, it facilitates, collects and protects the delivery of services and packages when customers are not home. In compliance with existing mail receptacle federal guidelines it revolutionizes the “mailbox” to accommodate the  delivery needs of the modern consumer from packages to groceries.

Name: LOCCIE
Description (SOSV):
Loccie is a platform that lets you create, discover and share real-world experiences. It uses natural language and game-like interface that get out of your way and let you explore.
You can use it anytime you want to get out of the house. Just fill out a smart sentence and let Loccie prepare the journey – a selection of spots creating a novel experience. 
Journeys appear in your Loccie App or Loccie Walkie, a minimalist GPS device. Both navigate you in a completely new way – no maps, just fun!

Name: Lootcakes
Description (SOSV):
Within free-to-play (F2P) video games ($82B global market), 80% of revenue comes from less than 1% of players. Unfortunately for game marketers, ad platforms have zero or limited data to target these big spenders. Lootcakes is a first-of-its-kind online service that unites and rewards the spenders of the F2P gaming ecosystem. Using our exclusive network and dataset, we enable game marketers to connect with the most valuable players.

在价值500亿美元的全球F2P网络游戏市场中，游戏公司80%的收入来源于全球游戏玩家中占比不到1%的高消费玩家，但其缺少这一群体的用户数据以进行营销推广。Lootcakes是全球首家连接与奖励F2P高消费玩家的线上服务平台。通过独家合作关系和强大的数据库，我们帮助游戏公司精准定位最具价值的消费者。

Name: CITYDATA
Description (SOSV): **LOTaData, a provider of geospatial intelligence for smarter cities and real-world businesses**, recently started analyzing their data for Italy, Spain and the US on a daily basis to understand anonymized people-movement and correlations with COVID-19 patterns. Social interactions and movements are the key drivers for the spread and by providing anonymized and aggregated information about the movement of people, LOTaDATA enables local and regional governments to better monitor the adherence to quarantine policy and helps individuals protect themselves by avoiding crowded areas. Fully GDPR compliant. More on their Data for Humanity program [here.](https://lotadata.com/blog/data-for-humanity/)

Name: Lotus Scoop
Description (SOSV):
Lotus Scoop ice cream is a popular brand of mass market ice cream, made fresh daily in our factory in Brooklyn New York.  We craft our ice cream from grass-fed, non-GMO dairy and ripe fruits, herbs, seeds and vegetables.  Lotus Scoop is known for its extremely high-quality ingredients, innovative flavorings, sustainable manufacturing practices and diverse urban branding.  

We are sold through major retailers like Whole Foods, Stop and Shop and Southeastern Grocers.   You can also buy Lotus Scoop in natural and gourmet specialty grocery chains and independent stores throughout the eastern seaboard (including food co-ops).

Name: Lovely
Description (SOSV):
At Lovely Inc. we are changing the way couples communicate about, and have, sex.

Sex is one of the most important factors of a healthy relationship and lack of good communication makes it very hard for couples to maintain a satisfying sex life.

Lovely is an intimate wearable and app that helps couples to explore and enhance their sex life by providing them with personalized, sex related ideas & suggestions based on their desires, feedback and data collected by Lovely.

We received seed-funding on April 2016, progressed from prototype to manufacturing and already sold nearly 1000 Lovelys without any marketing spend. Early customers are calling us the Apple and FitBit of sex. Plus, over 50 distributors and retailers from all over the world have reached out to us to sell our product.

Name: LugLoc
Description (SOSV):
At most modern airports, bags are sorted by destination manually. This is why 86% of luggage sorting errors occur at the airport of origin.

LugLoc is a unique geo-tracking solution that helps you track your bags at virtually any airport in the world in less than a minute. Lugloc is for everyone - whether traveling for business, vacation, or with large valuable items. The device packs inside any size bag, making it smarter and traceable. Together with the free mobile app, LugLoc lets you focus on what really matters and makes your trips more relaxing and enjoyable.

Name: Mapflow (Acq'd by Lexis Nexis)
Description (SOSV):
Mapflow Limited provides location intelligent solutions based on location services platform and enterprise location server. It offers off-the-shelf solutions for insurance and transport markets. The company provides solutions for property insurance business processes, such as sales and marketing, underwriting, claims, fraud, and reinsurance assessment. Its insurance solutions include Mapflow Geo, a set of products, which allows location-aware rating capability to be deployed in an insurance organization's pricing and underwriting functions; and Mapflow GEO:underwriting, a visualization tool providing the user with a view of addresses, policies, accumulations, and risks. It offers transport solutions in the areas, such as road safety, including intelligent speed adaptation; shared transport, including ride sharing; capacity planning, journey time monitoring, and traffic flow monitoring; road pricing, including congestion charging and other distance based pricing schemes; and rescue and recovery. The company also provides business and technical services, as well as strategic consulting; product development; system design, development, and implementation; trial design, operation, and management; and performance benchmarking services. 

Mapflow Limited was formerly known as Iris Group and changed its name in March 2001. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

The company was acquired by Lexis-Nexis in September 2013.

Name: Memstar
Description (SOSV): Memstar Pte Ltd specializes in the development, manufacture and application of PVDF hollow fiber membrane and membrane products for water and wastewater treatment as well as pretreatments for desalination and other RO processes. Although the company was established early 2005 by Dr Hailin Ge in Singapore, its history of membrane material research can be traced back to early 1990’ when Dr Ge and his group initiated researches into conducting polymers and membrane materials in Singapore Institute of Standards & Industrial Research (SISIR). Many years of such research accumulation laid a solid technological foundation for Memstar and enabled the young company growing so rapidly.
Pre-Embed: Memstar is based in Singapore, Singapore. Name: MicroSpray Tech.
Description (SOSV):
MicroSpray Technologies’ mission is to revolutionise ultra-fine particle manufacturing for pharmaceutical and research industries using an innovative, simple and cost-effective spray technology.



Currently, biopharmaceutical industries use costly chemical methods to manufacture microspheres, which rely on batch-type processes, have a low throughput and require a lot of bench space. This is costly, having poor processing efficiency (i.e. polymer-to-particle conversion) and the consumption of chemical precursors is very high. MicroSpray Technologies will to bring to market a novel spray-manufacturing system that increases particle production rates by up to 1600% in comparison to current conventional methods. This process is safer, sustainable and economical, with dramatically reduced size complexity. Our device enables reproducible control over particle size and therefore allows clinicians to administer control over the rate at which drugs are delivered to patients, cutting down on repeated administrations currently costing the NHS £900M/year. Through our platform process, we can find innovative ways of creating drug delivery carriers and subsequently open up new applications previously unexplored.



This platform technology (known as the electrospray) is considered the “holy grail” of particle manufacture in aerosol generation methods and can now provide the controlled production of polymeric particles for high-value added applications, such as pharmaceutical drug delivery.
Pre-Embed:

Name: MYI Diagnostics
Description (SOSV):
We envision a new age in healthcare, wherein a single highly multiplexed, multi-analyte assay with single-cell sensitivity not only replaces thousands of targeted diagnostics for individual cancers, infectious diseases, metabolic conditions and other rare or common disorders; but also, generates actionable individualized information to streamline clinical intervention strategies.
Using a modular platform, MYi has the technology to analyze hundreds of molecules in a drop of blood, where those molecules are both identified and quantified using a consumer next-generation sequencing device.  The obtained molecular information can be ported to a medical professional and then rerouted to the consumer as a medically curated report.  As we leverage the multiplex and high-throughput nature of next-generation sequencing, we can analyze hundreds of different samples in parallel, drastically minimizing costs.  With far reaching applications in cancer diagnostics, blood analyses, early disease detection, and precision medicine the potential for MYi to revolutionize medicine is high.
Pre-Embed:
MYI Diagnostics is based in San Diego, United States. Description: We envision a new age in healthcare, wherein a single highly multiplexed, multi-analyte assay with single-cell sensitivity not only replaces thousands of targeted diagnostics for individual cancers, infectious diseases, metabolic conditions and other rare or common disorders; but also, generates actionable individualized information to streamline clinical intervention strategies.
Using a modular platform, MYi has the technology to analyze hundreds of molecules in a drop of blood, where those molecules are both identified and quantified using a consumer next-generation sequencing device.  The obtained molecular information can be ported to a medical professional and then rerouted to the consumer as a medically curated report.  As we leverage the multiplex and high-throughput nature of next-generation sequencing, we can analyze hundreds of different samples in parallel, drastically minimizing costs.  With far reaching applications in cancer diagnostics, blood analyses, early disease detection, and precision medicine the potential for MYi to revolutionize medicine is high.

Name: Nerd Skincare
Description (SOSV):
WE ARE NERDS. What we believe is simple. What we create is powerful. Because it revolves around you.


We are innovators, formulators and skin-obsessed thinkers who are taking skincare deeper. To create acne-free skin and a lot more.
Our science uses your own biology to help your skin think differently, act differently and take care of itself. So it can look better than you could ever imagine.
Acne-free. Wrinkle-relieved. And so healthy it glows.

We dream in ideas. We do in science. And we prove it on your face. Because we want your best skin day to happen every day of your life.

We look at your biology on a microscopic level, which helps us to wage smart germ warfare every day.By working to balance and supercharge your skin’s microbiome, we create a unique ecosystem of perfectly balanced facial flora, which lets your skin thrive, rather than just struggle to survive.  
We make bacterial cellulose sheets that can help speed up chronical wound healing time by 40% and we plan to sell ours at about 1/20 of current market price.

Name: NetGenesis
Description (SOSV):
Net.Genesis Corp. provides software and professional services that help its customers understand, analyze and improve their online businesses.  Went public in 2000, acquired in 2001 by SPSS, which was acquired by IBM in 2009.


Its software enables companies to collect, store, organize, and analyze detailed information about the online behavior of customers and other visitors on their web sites. Net.Genesis software also enables its customers to import and analyze information about e-customers from other online and off-line software systems and databases. In addition, the company offers professional services including strategic analytic consulting, product implementation, application integration, training programs, and technical support services. The company markets its products and related services in United States, Europe, and Australia. It was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


As of December 21, 2001, net.Genesis Corp. was acquired by SPSS Inc.

Name: Next Thing Co.
Description (SOSV):
Next Thing Co is the creator of CHIP, the world's first $9 computer.  

CHIP is built for making - we’ve packed a powerful processor, 4 GB of storage, stereo audio, video out, and lots of connections for playing and making your projects and products.

The CHIP Operating System is built for doing: browse the ‘net, send email, play video games, listen to music, write a novel, watch a video, or learn programming. And because it’s based on the popular Linux Debian, if there’s something you need, you can probably install it. With dozens of applications and tools preinstalled, CHIP is ready to do computer things the moment you power it on.

Name: Nextdoorganics Inc
Description (SOSV):
We have a unique and effortless system for bringing the highest quality locally produced food to our members from high social impact farms and small-batch food makers.

We fill subscriptions ($20-$50/week) of local organic vegetables, fruits, heirloom beans and grains, small-batch pantry items and add-ons like Bed Stuy’s famous SCRATCHbread, organic pastured chicken eggs, farmstand cheeses, grass-fed cow butter, locally-roasted Brewklyn Grind organic coffee, and more. Our web store is filled with a rotating selection from Granola Lab to raw fermented hot sauce to herbs, spices, and teas.

We pay a great deal of attention to our sourcing. Priority is given to localness. At our flagship hub in Brooklyn, NY, our closest farms are the Bushwick Campus Farm (an organic-in-practice educational farm at a high school in Brooklyn), Sky Vegetables (rooftop hydroponic farm on a sustainable Housing Authority project in the Bronx), and Green Grass Life (the largest indoor farm in NYC in the Bronx).

Name: Niwa
Description (SOSV):
Niwa is a new platform that makes growing anything as easy, fun and interactive as a swipe of your smartphone screen.

Our platform will serve as a ‘brain’ for any kind of growing system, automating and creating the easiest possible growing experience. With this solution, everyone will be able to manage sizeable harvests and maximize yields, all while overseeing the process from any internet-connected device. 

The platform consists of 4 elements:

1. The ARC - the ever-expanding depository of growing programs accessible with the press of the button. 

2. The Software - extremely easy-to-use interface enables you to track your plant progress, see how long until harvest, see what tasks you need to perform etc.

3. The Hardware - plug your sensors and actuators to make your growing system smart

4. The Community - the crowdsourced data is used to optimized growing programs

Niwa is the first step toward putting our food in our own hands.

Name: NUA Robotics
Description (SOSV):
NUA is a robotic platform and an app, which allows your things to follow and communicate with your smartphones. 

Our technology combines IoT ,robotics and computer vision so people can move freely in different environments, releasing them from the burden of carrying or navigating their things, all whilst receiving data (weight, location, pictures and more) to their smartphones.

We are the first to combine following, obstacle avoidance and communication capabilities into one platform and make it accessible for everyday use. Part of the unique accessibility is the fact that our following technology is the first to connect to your smartphone and not a special clip on device.

Name: NuLeaf Tech
Description (SOSV):
NuLeaf engineers compact ecosystems for off-grid water solutions.

A sustainable, equitable future needs water solutions that are on-site, all-natural, and available for all - let’s get there together.

Today our wastewater treatment options are pretty limited - aging municipal treatment plants are crumbling and septic tanks won't be able to pick up the slack. With too few options in between, billions of people are struggling to go off-grid with their water.

In 2017, in the middle of California's record-breaking drought, two nature nerds that have watched too much Star Trek (as we affectionally call ourselves) started paving the way for on-site and modular treatment for all at NASA Ames. We leaned into intersectional and personal wastewater treatment and engineered the NuTree and were quickly backed by SOSV and RebelBio.

Today we're a startup that empowers everyday people to treat and recycle their water with nature’s methods. We engineered the NuTree, which is a novel on-site wastewater treatment device. Its modular units can effectively treat waste from a single household to growing businesses.

The NuTree also boasts unprecedented ease of use - no Ph.D. required! - which makes the system not only easy to construct but low maintenance to make the system affordable. It blows our competition out of the water with effective treatment and a better price point with all the perks of green design with a circular, zero-waste system that includes water recycling, bioenergy, and growing crops.

From off-grid tiny homes to microbreweries to eco-warrior gardens - Help us pave the way for a future where no one has to worry about dirty water.

Name: Néit
Description (SOSV):
At Néit we're all about creating better ways for people to store and carry things. We invent, produce and distribute great looking products that work really well, solving practical storage problems at home and when travelling.

Without compromising durability nor protection of your personal belongings, Néit Luggage is able to go from about 35CM to less than 8CM and simply slide under your bed or get hung next to your suits or dresses thanks to their carabiner-style handle.

Néit Luggage is not only smart in the respect that it reduces in size in a cramped space, but it also has GPS incorporated with its Travel Lifestyle app, making sure you’re never hung out to dry.

Name: Ao Air (f/k/a O2 O2)
Description (SOSV):
**Ao Air facewear cleans the air of pathogens and pollutants using proprietary nanofibers.** Their lightweight, battery-powered facewear “engineers” the air using a fan to create positive air pressure behind a shield, protecting the user without requiring a seal. The mask protects the user from 99.75% of 0.25 micron (250nm) particulates / pathogens. There is an option for customizable filtration that allows for combatting specific threats. 

Compared to a market leading N95 mask, they are 44-67% cooler, 20-41% less humid and have 60-90% less CO2 inside the breathing area. They have working prototypes, and are aiming to have scaled production ready in the next 2-3 months.

Ao Air was formerly known as O2 O2.

Name: OaCP IE LTD
Description (SOSV):
Cancer diagnosis is a race against time. Traditional DNA tests are slow, costly, and often lead to delayed treatments. OACP's innovative technology dramatically accelerates this critical process, providing doctors with faster, more accurate results. By slashing diagnosis time by 97%, we're helping to improve patient outcomes and reduce the overall burden on healthcare systems. 
OaCP-patented products are already approved for medical use in The EU and on the market.
With a proven track record and strong industry partnerships, OACP is poised for rapid growth. Join us in revolutionizing cancer care.

Name: NewPath Probiotics
Description (SOSV): Millions of people are diagnosed with chronic sinus symptoms and countless others consistently purchase remedies for nasal issues. Billions of dollars are being spent on treatments that offer temporary relief with long-term negative consequences, such as nasal steroids and decongestants. Even worse, these sinus sufferers are often forced into a downward symptom spiral by receiving strong antibiotics. Modern science has shown the root cause of chronic sinus issues is the lack of friendly microbes and yet treatments of antibiotics wipe out friendly microbes along with the pathogens they are intended to kill. At NewPath Probiotics we have designed a probiotic that specifically addresses this issue. We have designed a sinus spray featuring friendly microbes. Through competing with and killing the disease-causing pathogens and breaking up biofilms, our probiotic will bring back sinus wellness and restore the sinus ecosystem. Joe Miller Co-founder & CEO Entrepreneurship + Sales // Dr. Jayant Pinto Co-founder & CMO Sinus Researcher // Gio Barbat Co-founder & CFO MBA + Financial Management // Dr. Tala Ballouz COO MSc PH-HSR + Operations

Name: OneSkin
Description (SOSV): OneSkin aims to promote skin rejuvenation by decoding the aging process. Name: Ember Medical Inc
Description (SOSV):
EMBER  Medical Inc. is a comprehensive telehealth platform working directly with physicians and patients in underserved and rural areas to mitigate the spread of COVID-19. With a patient base of over 10,000 in Egypt and the greater MENA region, EMBER has witnessed a significant surge in download and call volume since the outbreak emerged in February.
- Working with rural clinics in the US to ensure coverage for high-risk areas that lack medical infrastructure. As larger telehealth services struggle to keep up with increased demand, EMBER is stepping up to fight the epidemic.
- The platform is dedicating additional physicians and resources to the COVID-19 battle, including a new triage service that determines if a patient’s symptoms meet the COVID-19 criteria and immediately connects high-risk cases with a physician.

Name: PartnerGo
Description (SOSV):
PartnerGo (previously PartnerSss) helps real estate professionals to access the cross border real estate market which amounted to US $260 billion in the past 5 years.

PartnerGo.com is an online B2B real estate referral network that serves as a platform to match and connect real estate buyer and seller agents as well as real estate developers around the globe. PartnerGo.com matches projects offered by seller agents and developers with interested buyer agents.

In just a few months, professionals have signed up from all viable markets, including North America, Europe, Middle East, South america, North Asia, and S.E. Asia.  They are discussing about deals ranging from US $400k to US $40 million. 

Our particular focus is on connecting international real estate players with the agents in the emerging markets and China where it is one of the key driver of cross border transactions. 

Version 2.0 is launching this November

Name: Petrolance
Description (SOSV): Their first product, SimVIEW, is a vizualizer of hydrodynamic simulation data. It has a user-friendly interface, modern 2D and 3D plotting tools with stunning graphics. SimVIEW currently works with Schlumberger Eclipse/Intersect format. They plan to add the support of Landmark VIP/Nexus, and Roxar Tempest formats in the nearest future. Name: Optimize Health
Description (SOSV): [Optimize Health](https://www.optimize.health/), a HAX portfolio company that provides device-agnostic Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM), Patient Engagement and Workflow software for front-line healthcare providers, recently launched a COVID-19 screening tool that practices can use to proactively screen and triage patients. optimize.health was already growing rapidly since new reimbursements for Remote Patient Monitoring were offered by Medicare in 2019, and has seen a recent surge in demand for their solution as practices are rapidly moving towards virtual care models. The optimize.health platform evolved from Pillsy, which completed the HAX program in 2016, and now includes a suite of technology-enabled services in addition to the core software.

Name: PinPress
Description (SOSV):
Molds today only have one shape, costing manufacturers as much as a million dollars per month, per plant in downtime from equipment changes. PinPress is a shape-shifting tool that gives you a thousand molds in one, eliminating the need to physically change equipment. 

Changeovers are required to produce-to-demand, and avoid excess inventory. They also allow manufacturers to produce similar products on the same manufacturing line. However, changeovers are manual and very expensive. PinPress can eliminate this cost. It can also eliminate the cost of holding large tooling inventory. 

Dynamic tooling like PinPress can also be used for rapid prototyping, where expensive processes like CNC are used to create plastic prototypes. Lastly, real-time surface control can greatly improve process yield in processes like plastic sheet extrusion.
Pre-Embed:
PinPress is based in Waterloo, Canada. Description: Molds today only have one shape, costing manufacturers as much as a million dollars per month, per plant in downtime from equipment changes. PinPress is a shape-shifting tool that gives you a thousand molds in one, eliminating the need to physically change equipment. 

Changeovers are required to produce-to-demand, and avoid excess inventory. They also allow manufacturers to produce similar products on the same manufacturing line. However, changeovers are manual and very expensive. PinPress can eliminate this cost. It can also eliminate the cost of holding large tooling inventory. 

Dynamic tooling like PinPress can also be used for rapid prototyping, where expensive processes like CNC are used to create plastic prototypes. Lastly, real-time surface control can greatly improve process yield in processes like plastic sheet extrusion.

Name: Pixl Toys
Description (SOSV):
Turn your smartphone into a fun kids toy! 

Most families have an old smartphone sitting unused in the home.  We're making toys that make use of those smartphones while encouraging creative and active play. This allows us to keep the BOM down and sell the toys at affordable price points. 

The products feature companion apps that lead to our larger play of Toys as a Service ("TaaS"). Contact us to learn about our first product, Pixlplay!

The products feature companion apps that lead to our larger play of Toys as a Service ("TaaS"). Contact us to learn about our first product, Pixlplay!

Name: Pixtory
Description (SOSV):
Pixtory transforms the home screen into a gateway of content. The next billion smartphone users in India, Indonesia and other emerging markets will be first time smartphone users. They would be storage conscious, unfamiliar with the app ecosystem and would be primarily vernacular. Pixtory makes the home screen as their gateway of content such that users don't need 25-30 apps but the most important 5-10 apps. The home screen takes care of the rest of their content needs.



Pixtory anchors on the format of wallpaper stories where every wallpaper has a story behind it. These wallpaper stories are created by a community of contributors as well as an editorial team. Users can use simple gestures to consume wallpaper stories everyday. We use wallpaper stories as an anchor and allow users to consume aggregated content and commerce propositions right on the home screen in a very native experience. Pixtory is currently available in English, Hindi & Indonesian and we have 4 other languages going live soon

Name: Plantedit
Description (SOSV): Our mission is to produce non-transgenic, regulatory free, sustainable, consumer oriented genome edited plant products. PLANTeDIT is the first biotech company dedicated to use patented next generation genome editing tools  CRISPR/Cas9 RNPs® from our key collaborator Toolgen (http://toolgen.com/?lang=en) with our transformation technology for efficient direct delivery and swift regeneration of genome edited plants. Our mission is also to revolutionize plant transformation technology with our innovative, universal, cost effective, swift transformation system applicable to broad a range of crop species for direct delivery of genome editing tools. Further, PLANTeDIT aims to develop highly pure mammalian protein and human drugs at cost effective price using genome edited plant platform.

Name: Portier Technologies
Description (SOSV):
Portier enables hoteliers and 3rd parties to action the world’s richest traveler data via an eco-system that’s built around customized smartphones placed in hotel rooms.

While travelers benefit from full and localized access to the hotel and the local eco-system from a single place, hoteliers and local businesses are empowered to provide a more tailor-made experience to travelers based on actual behavioral insights.

Today, the Portier Eco-System delivers such data precision that hoteliers see a revenue increase of up to 25%, while marketing campaigns run on Portier’s Push Messaging feature see industry-leading click-through rates of 7%, within 5 minutes of submission.

Portier creates a more unique and significantly more personal traveler experience.

Name: PowerHouse Dynamics
Description (SOSV):
Powerhouse Dynamics uses cloud-based controls and analytics to deliver enterprise-wide operational and energy efficiency solutions to portfolios of small commercial facilities, including restaurants, convenience stores, retailers, and others. The Powerhouse Dynamics SiteSage platform reduces energy, maintenance, and repair expenses by centralizing control, analysis, and management of energy-consuming equipment.

Engineered specifically for smaller facilities, SiteSage features powerful functionality delivered via simple online and mobile interfaces. The system continuously enhances efficiencies by controlling major loads, monitoring power consumption, providing insight into the performance of individual pieces of equipment, and tracking gas and water usage. Patented analytics deliver actionable intelligence via diagnostics and alerts, and SiteSage’s enterprise-wide benchmarking capabilities identify underperforming facilities and assets.

Name: Prospective Research
Description (SOSV): Prospective Research, Inc is creating feed-incorporated preventative disease management solutions for the aquaculture industry that completely removes the need for antibiotics and medicated feed. The company’s technology platform allows them to modulate bacterial behavior using microbial-signaling molecules for the local delivery of therapeutics directly inside the gut of any farmed species. The company seeds trillions of bacterial pharmacies into the microbiome of fin fish, shrimp, and shellfish and can selectively turn on bacterial genes encoding bio-active therapeutics inside the animal for protection against bacterial, fungal, and parasitic pathogens.

Our award-winning small-molecule drug discovery platform uniquely integrates a novel synthesis design strategy, computational modelling, and patient-derived cell-based screening to rapidly and cost-effectively unlock targets considered undruggable using existing approaches.

Name: Pure Cultures
Description (SOSV):
Pure Cultures is an artisan facility providing custom, state-of-the-art probiotic strains for clients nationwide.



Pure Cultures is dedicated to producing high-quality products that add health benefits and help solve issues related to the stresses of their industrial economy. They are experts in the development of products for both Human and Animal Health.



Their single and multiple probiotic blends are tailored to meet each client’s unique needs. They are a custom fermentation company employing a range of reactors to produce proprietary probiotic strains. They provide custom silage inoculation blends starting with orders as small as 1.0kg quantities.



Their fermentation capabilities range from bench-top to large-scale. The fermentation process incorporates cutting-edge technology in media development and selection, and in the harvesting and preservation of probiotic cultures. They partner with their clients from idea to commercialization, and excel at fulfilling short lead times.



Pure Cultures specializes in strain-specific research and development, and can provide general technical expertise on new probiotic delivery methods and new formula combinations. They are experts in fermentation research, product formulation and new product development.

Name: QPD
Description (SOSV):
The Qualified Products Database (QPD) serves as the official repository for all qualification information in the form of Qualification Data Sets.

The QPD contains qualification information regarding products and manufacturers as compiled and maintained by the individual Qualifying Activities(QA). One of the primary goals of QPD is to create an on-line, real-time replacement for paper-based QPL documents. It can provide buyers with assurance that items currently comply with specified requirements. The QPD is a robust application that facilitates frequent updates to qualification data and its immediate availability to users within the Standardization community.

Name: Quartolio
Description (SOSV):
Quartolio accelerates research by connecting the dots across scientific articles, clinical trials, and patents with the power of AI.



During IndieBio we prepared our platform for public beta release, including our mobile application which allows people to take a photo of whatever their reading or writing, and discover scientific knowledge in real time. We also grew the quantity and value of our data by over 800%, and formed staretgic partnerships with one of the world's largest STEM publishers and libraries.



Up next, we're releasing our public beta, and inviting scientists around the world to join Quartolio. We're also actively closing deals with B2B customers and partners in pharma, publishing, and the academic library space. To support these goals, we're raising $2M.

Name: Quitbit
Description (SOSV):
Quitbit is the first smart lighter and app track your smoking. It’s like an activity tracker for smoking, but designed to help manage and encourage people to gradually cut back their smoking. We’re trying to make the world a little healthier bit by bit.  

Quitbit helps you understand your smoking. It has a bright display to show you things like how many cigarettes you’ve smoked and how long it’s been since your last one so you can make better decisions. It pairs with a mobile platform, so you can use it to cut back at your own pace, set custom reduction plans, and even customize when and how often the lighter works to help achieve your goals.

Name: Ranomics
Description (SOSV):
Ranomics is building the world's first comprehensive knowledgebase of functionally-characterized genetic variants to help determine their role in disease development and treatment.

Even in the absence of established clinical evidence, knowing the impact that a genetic variant has on its protein’s biological function can provide strong evidence to support classification. By determining the functional impact of every missense variant in known disease-causing genes, we’re equipping clinical laboratories and healthcare organizations with the information they need to accurately assess the pathogenicity of novel and rare variants

Name: RaVaBe
Description (SOSV):
When Al Ritchie, CEO and Chief RaVaBe “just make it simple” Evangelist quit his job in banking in 2012 he knew that something had to be done to fix the problems that plagued the projects he had worked on for years.

Name: Revolution Bioengineering
Description (SOSV):
Petunia Circadia - the flower that changes color. 

A flower that changes colors is impossible, it's science fiction - but it would be an amazing thing to see. Something like this can't be bred with conventional methods. Revolution Bioengineering can make the impossible possible with synthetic biology, using engineering principles to design new biological functions. 

Petunia Circadia will be a desirable luxury product that shows the world the incredible potential ofGM technology. The public can get behind the idea of a color changing flower. Horticulture thrives on novelty and variety, to the tune of a 2.3 billion dollars wholesale plant market. Petunias comprise 86 million dollars of that industry, and a popular petunia cultivar can generate up to 320K in royalties per year. The number of cultivars we can bring to market, virus free and tailored to the region, is limited only by the time and money we have available.

Name: Ria Health
Description (SOSV):
Ria Health is a tech-enabled telehealth medical practice that provides evidence-based treatment for Alcohol Use Disorder (AUD).

Our Physician managed program includes Medication Assisted Treatment (MAT), digital tools for tracking progress, harm reduction, peer support and one on one coaching all done through the convenience of telehealth. 

Our members have embraced our engaging program and achieved breakthrough outcomes in reducing their drinking and staying active and engaged to make meaningful behavioral change.

We work with health plans, self-insured employers and health systems to provide a treatment option that is effective, convenient and affordable.  
For more information visit www.riahealth.com.

Name: Rik
Description (SOSV):
Rikai Labs is building a platform for chat based language learning games. 

Our flagship product, ComicEnglish, allows players to learn a language in an engaging narrative driven format. Our system allows teachers to create chat like lessons. Players get so immersed in these they forget they're learning!

Each lesson is built around a detective story where players interview in-game characters. They use their language skills to solve a mystery. The story is combined with vocabulary, grammar and practice drills to help players effectively communicate with in game characters to solve in game mysteries.

Using different types of game widgets, players interactively create sentences. AI chatbots and teacher supervised chats then respond to the player’s inputs like real people.

Name: SchoolMatch Inc
Description (SOSV):
School Match is an online platform that connects Chinese students who wish to attend university abroad, with students who already attend those universities abroad. The abroad students become mentors for the Chinese students, offering guidance on subjects such as life outside of China, which schools to apply to, and how to get admitted.

We connect mentees and mentors that are best fit for each other. For example, a high school student who wishes to attend Yale with an intended major of Art Studies, would be best served by talking to someone who already has been admitted to Yale, and is already taking Art Studies courses there. Students can search through a huge list of mentors across all universities to find their ideal fit, and pay an hourly fee.

Many students in China aim to attend university abroad, and often have a hard time finding enough accurate information. The best solution to this problem is through one-on-one mentorship by someone who has already experienced the process.

Name: SensiPass Ltd.
Description (SOSV):
Founded in 2013, SensiPass set out to develop a better user authentication system, one that would overcome the (entire) multitude of problems with the ubiquitous username/password. This was to not only an effort to address the challenges of typical users needing secure access to digital and physical assets, but also to provide accessible security for users challenged by language or physical limitations such as mobility or dyslexia. Our solution was to make the "knowledge factor" (typically a password) an interaction with a user-specified asset, e.g. their own biometric or other object that befits their capabilities.

Since then, we have been awarded relevant patents in the UK, US, EU, Japan and China and have patents pending in Korea and India. We have also begun pursuing another set of claims in the US originally filed by Mike Hill (founder) in 2011.

Recap of Results:
-Bulletproof credential databases: our digital signature is highly dynamic, enabling us to reject any exact matches, eliminating the risk of replay attacks from stolen credentials. 
-Integrated, secure credential self-resets
-Un-shareable credentials: users cannot share their interactive secrets and biometrics, ensuring the identification and accountability of users accessing assets and executing transactions.
-Proof-positive identity assurance: as the only authentication product designed from the beginning to include all three factors, we offer the highest level of identity assurance available, eliminating the risk of insider threats to your organisation.
-Single ID for mobile, desktop and physical access: our system can support all levels of digital and physical access control in a single system.

Name: SHAKA
Description (SOSV):
Shaka wind meter is the first cloud-connected wind meter out there. It's a small sensor device which plugs into your smartphone and is as accurate as other portable devices out there.

Smartphone platform allows real-time wind information sharing between wind addicts (kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, skydivers etc). Useful for golfers and even for farmers.

In the long term we are building a smartphone-based sensor platform that can and will be used for many different purposes.

Name: Shaper
Description (SOSV):
At Shaper, we fuse robotics with handheld tools to simplify the process of making. We think everyone can create with better tools, so we’re working to make tools smarter, more intuitive, and easier to use.

Shaper Origin combines robotic precision with hand tool simplicity to create a first-of-its-kind machine: a handheld CNC that only cuts what you tell it to. This portable, intuitive, and powerful tool is capable of handling a wide variety of materials and projects.

Name: ShenzhenWare
Description (SOSV): ShenzhenWare is a dynamic community for hardware innovators. Name: ShopHop
Description (SOSV):
Using ShopHop is like messaging your best local friend and having her take you to her favorite little shop (or five) as soon as you get off the plane. ShopHop is a curated fashion guide that makes style serendipity easier: we save you time by providing curated expertise of local shopping for any item, location, style, or mood - in every Asian shopping mecca from Bangkok to Hong Kong, in English & Chinese. 

For traveling fashion lovers in Asia who lack the time and knowledge to shop like locals, ShopHop is a online/offline style guide and point-by-point map that transforms abstract regional expertise into actionable shopping tours.

Unlike comprehensive web directories like Google and Yelp or physical maps and human guides, ShopHop's relationships with editorial, style influencer, and small-business partners empower us to focus on the fashion vertical with only the best, latest, and always-up-to-date shopping experiences in an intuitive and socially connected mobile app.
